name: Specialist Role & Skill Registry
title: Specialist Role & Skill Registry
description: Authoritative registry mapping Operational Intelligence roles to enriched, specialized agents and their Tactical Capability skillsets.

python_ai_intelligence.mission: Engineering high-fidelity Python backends and agentic AI systems.

full_stack_web_intelligence.mission: Engineering performance-first, beautiful, and resilient web applications.

dotnet_cloud_intelligence.mission: Engineering resilient, enterprise-grade .NET and Azure systems.

sap_systems_intelligence.mission: Engineering 'Clean Core' compliant SAP extensions and integrations.

java_systems_intelligence.mission: Engineering resilient, observable Java/Spring enterprise systems.

system_architecture_intelligence.mission: Enforcing structural clarity and architectural excellence.

project_operations_intelligence.mission: Orchestrating agile delivery and operational reporting.

workflow_quality_intelligence.mission: Orchestrating cognitive cycles and automated verification.

knowledge_operations_intelligence.mission: Guardian of cognitive landscape and referential truth.

personal_operations_intelligence.mission: Digital life management and high-fidelity communication.

staffing_logic.action: Dispatch KNOPS for immediate post-mortem and remediation.
Dispatch WQSS for cognitive cycle execution.

best_practices: Always reference this registry during the 'Tactical Staffing' phase of the MSO.
Validate that the selected Specialist's current axioms align with the task requirements.
Perform a 'Role Check' if two specialists have overlapping tactical skills for a single task.

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Patterns are verified through automated testing.
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: The user maintains control over all generated output.
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: All automated actions are logged and verifiable.
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Strict safety checks prevent destructive operations.
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Uniform patterns ensure predictable system behavior.

generic_base.description: Base pattern for agent-staffing for consistency.
generic_base.use_when: Always as a foundation for implementation.
